data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: What I can see from the picture is that there are three adult people sitting in a room. Two of them are men and the other one is a woman. Behind them, there are two whiteboards on which several lines of words have been written. The woman is chatting with the man in a black short-sleeved T-shirt while the man in a blue shirt and grey pants is looking towards the other side of the room. Apparently, they are in a relatively easy situation as indicated by the smile on the woman's face. (92字)
